text:
Jana Pidrmanová (born March 17, 1985, Cheb) is a Czech theatre and film actress.
Biography.
She spent her childhood in Františkovy Lázně and graduated from a hotel high school. After graduation she studied at the Theatre Faculty of the Academy of Performing Arts (DAMU) from 2004 to 2008. Some of her teachers were Eva Salzmannová, Alois Švehlík, Jan Nebeský and Daria Ullrichová. She also studied special education at the University of Hradec Králové. After graduating from the Theatre Faculty of the Academy of Performing Arts (DAMU), she first performed at the South Bohemian Theater (Jihočeské divadlo, České Budějovice) and since 2009 has been performing at the National Theater in Prague.
